ComicInfo.Title: Mean Cuisine; Roust or You Play, You Pay; The Summer of '87; The Night J. R. Spent in Jail; My Covenant with the Hawk!; How Cops "Pick Up" Girls; F.T.W.; The Woods; The Long Arm of the Law!; Badass Bust Stories; Amazons Episode Four; Her Bloody Majesty's Pleasure; Double Enmity

ComicInfo.Summary:
An escaped prisoner turns into a weird monster from living in a swamp.
Mary and her boyfriend are out sailing with four of his co-workers. When they return they find themselves surrounded by the police.
A woman requests a portrait for her husband who is serving a life term in jail.
